activity_differential: adult and child walking together through flower shop walkway
camera panning and moving through garden area
adult supervising child in outdoor flower shop
description: A camera moves through a flower shop or garden area at night, following two people (one adult, one child) walking along a pathway lined with plants and flowers. The camera then pans and moves past the people, focusing on the plants, flowers, and outdoor area.
